item.title: Catching SIGTERM in Python
item.description: I needed a very simple SIGTERM handler in a script I was working on. It is very simple to do so in Python, add a handler method and ‘register’ it. First define a handler method: def sigterm_handler(signal, frame): # this method defines the handler i.e. what to do # when you receive a SIGTERM pass And register the handler: # Register the handler and let the process know that # there is a handler for SIGTERM signal.
